exerelin_alliances.numAlliances: There are $numAlliances alliance(s) in the cluster

exerelin_credits.contribution_fractalSoftworks: The Fractal Softworks team that made Starsector

exerelin_fleets.fleetSpawnMessage: A fleet is being launched at $market, in $location. It will be underway shortly.
exerelin_fleets.fleetSpawnMessageLocal: A fleet is being launched and will begin defending $market shortly.

exerelin_victoryScreen.victory_conquest: Congratulations! $TheFaction has crushed all opposition and now reigns supreme over the $clusterName cluster!
exerelin_victoryScreen.victory_diplomatic: Congratulations! $TheFaction and its allies control the $clusterName cluster!
exerelin_victoryScreen.victory_conquest_ally: Congratulations! Your ally $theFaction has crushed all opposition and now reigns supreme over the $clusterName cluster!
exerelin_victoryScreen.victory_diplomatic_ally: Congratulations! You have joined $theFaction and its other allies in controlling the $clusterName cluster!
exerelin_victoryScreen.defeat_conquest: Alas, $theFaction has conquered the $clusterName cluster. All your efforts have come to naught.
exerelin_victoryScreen.defeat_diplomatic: $TheFaction and its allies now dominate the $clusterName cluster. Unforunately, you are not one of them...
